segment.source: How to Deploy a MED-V Workspace Manually
segment.target: How to Deploy a MED-V Workspace Manually

segment.source: How to Deploy a MED-V Workspace Manually
segment.target: How to Deploy a MED-V Workspace Manually

segment.source: How to Deploy a MED-V Workspace Manually
segment.target: How to Deploy a MED-V Workspace Manually

segment.source: In some instances, you might want to deploy your MED-V workspace manually, for example, if your company does not use an electronic software distribution system to deploy applications.
segment.target: In some instances, you might want to deploy your MED-V workspace manually, for example, if your company does not use an electronic software distribution system to deploy applications.

segment.source: This section provides instruction about how to manually deploy a MED-V workspace.
segment.target: This section provides instruction about how to manually deploy a MED-V workspace.

segment.source: To deploy a MED-V workspace manually
segment.target: To deploy a MED-V workspace manually

segment.source: Copy all prerequisite applications and the MED-V workspace package files to a shared drive or to a DVD.
segment.target: Copy all prerequisite applications and the MED-V workspace package files to a shared drive or to a DVD.

segment.source: The following is a list of the required applications and files.
segment.target: The following is a list of the required applications and files.

segment.source: Windows Virtual PC.
segment.target: Windows Virtual PC.

segment.source: For more information, see Configure Installation Prerequisites.
segment.target: For more information, see Configure Installation Prerequisites.

segment.source: Windows Virtual PC Additions and Updates.
segment.target: Windows Virtual PC Additions and Updates.

segment.source: For more information, see Configure Installation Prerequisites.
segment.target: For more information, see Configure Installation Prerequisites.

segment.source: MED-V Host Agent Installation File – installs the Host Agent (MED-VHostAgentSetup installation file).
segment.target: MED-V Host Agent Installation File – installs the Host Agent (MED-VHostAgentSetup installation file).

segment.source: Warning
segment.target: Warning

segment.source: Close Internet Explorer before you install the MED-V Host Agent, otherwise conflicts can occur later with URL redirection.
segment.target: Close Internet Explorer before you install the MED-V Host Agent, otherwise conflicts can occur later with URL redirection.

segment.source: You can also do this by specifying a computer restart during a distribution.
segment.target: You can also do this by specifying a computer restart during a distribution.

segment.source: MED-V Workspace Installer, VHD, and Setup Executable – created with the MED-V Workspace Packager.
segment.target: MED-V Workspace Installer, VHD, and Setup Executable – created with the MED-V Workspace Packager.

segment.source: For more information, see Create a MED-V Workspace Package.
segment.target: For more information, see Create a MED-V Workspace Package.

segment.source: Important
segment.target: Important

segment.source: The compressed VHD file (.medv) and the Setup executable program (setup.exe) must be in the same folder as the MED-V workspace installer.
segment.target: The compressed VHD file (.medv) and the Setup executable program (setup.exe) must be in the same folder as the MED-V workspace installer.

segment.source: Install the following in the order listed.
segment.target: Install the following in the order listed.

segment.source: The end user can perform this task manually or you can create a script to install the following:
segment.target: The end user can perform this task manually or you can create a script to install the following:

segment.source: Windows Virtual PC and the Windows Virtual PC additions and updates.
segment.target: Windows Virtual PC and the Windows Virtual PC additions and updates.

segment.source: A computer restart is required.
segment.target: A computer restart is required.

segment.source: The MED-V Host Agent.
segment.target: The MED-V Host Agent.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: If it is running, Internet Explorer must be restarted before the installation of the MED-V Host Agent can finish.
segment.target: If it is running, Internet Explorer must be restarted before the installation of the MED-V Host Agent can finish.

segment.source: The MED-V workspace package.
segment.target: The MED-V workspace package.

segment.source: Install the MED-V workspace by running the setup.exe program that is included in the MED-V workspace package files.
segment.target: Install the MED-V workspace by running the setup.exe program that is included in the MED-V workspace package files.

segment.source: Complete first time setup.
segment.target: Complete first time setup.

segment.source: After the MED-V workspace is installed, you have the option of starting MED-V.
segment.target: After the MED-V workspace is installed, you have the option of starting MED-V.

segment.source: This starts the MED-V Host Agent.
segment.target: This starts the MED-V Host Agent.

segment.source: You can either start MED-V at that time, or start the MED-V Host Agent later to complete first time setup.
segment.target: You can either start MED-V at that time, or start the MED-V Host Agent later to complete first time setup.

segment.source: To start the MED-V Host Agent, click Start, click All Programs, click Microsoft Enterprise Desktop Virtualization, and then click MED-V Host Agent.
segment.target: To start the MED-V Host Agent, click Start, click All Programs, click Microsoft Enterprise Desktop Virtualization, and then click MED-V Host Agent.

segment.target: Related topics

segment.target: How to Deploy a MED-V Workspace in a Windows 7 Image
